house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1991 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Microwave, Pantry,Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
